item.title: I'll just be the only one that posts anything here. [OC]
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Ollie, post:9, topic:454471”]Use the same sound in the song to create a melody, rather than the same 4x4 loop at a different freq.[/quote]I see what you’re sayin’. I have to work on how I produce, I think. My work structure is terrible.

Also, it’s a totally different synth. All of them are independent of each other.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

You don’t notice that change in the sub bass? It’s literally a copy pasted riff, down an octave.

Edit: I see what you’re sayin’. I don’t know though. I don’t hear anything sound too off about.

item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Ok so you have the percussion ‘clap + cymbal’ (I think?) main beat, then you have the bass melody. At around 43 seconds, 46 seconds, and 49-50 seconds the melody does a ‘run’ upwards, and it just sounds like it’s going too fast to fit in with the beat
